name: QodeUnlocked
description:
Quantum Game Jam 2022

Complete video with gameplay and explanations and instructions: https://drive.google.com/file/d/17gOITk_pUpgzWqfTfTRoai0zxWkfs8Je/view?usp=drive... 

How is your game related to the theme "PATTERNS"? 

The game uses a combination of quantum gates which relates to patterns.

How is your game related to quantum physics? 

The game is basically a password cracking game. Unlike the number or pattern locks we encounter generally, our game involves a pattern of quantum games which have to be opted in the right way to take the initial quantum state to the given final quantum state.
